hero.subtitle: KAIROS uses the ancient Japanese concept of Ikigai and AI to match you with careers that align with your passions, skills, and the world's needs.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Our application uses a three-step process to guide you from self-discovery to a concrete action plan.
features.card1_text: An interactive space to articulate your passions, skills, values, and interests, forming the foundation of your career journey.
features.card2_text: Our AI analyzes your unique profile to suggest careers that align with your Ikigai, complete with a personalized fit score.
features.card3_text: Receive a dynamic, step-by-step 3-year action plan to achieve your career goals, generated just for you.

footer.text: Enjoy your journey and believe in yourself.

dashboard.title: Welcome to Your Journey
dashboard.description: Your path to a fulfilling career starts here.
dashboard.step1_card_text: Define your passions, skills, values, and interests.
dashboard.step2_card_text: See AI-matched careers that align with your profile.
dashboard.progress_text: Complete the steps to unlock your personalized action plan.
dashboard.progress_subtext: Your journey is just beginning. Let's build a future you love.

ikigai.title: Ikigai Canvas
ikigai.description: This is your space for self-discovery. What drives you?
ikigai.profileDescription: Fill in the four pillars of Ikigai. Be thoughtful and honest with yourself. This information will be used by our AI to find career matches for you.
ikigai.passionsPlaceholder: e.g., Solving complex puzzles, creating music, helping others, storytelling...
ikigai.skillsPlaceholder: e.g., Programming in Python, public speaking, graphic design, data analysis...
ikigai.valuesPlaceholder: e.g., Sustainability, accessible education, mental health support, technological innovation...
ikigai.interestsLabel: What you can be PAID FOR (Interests)
ikigai.interestsPlaceholder: e.g., Building software, creating marketing campaigns, providing financial advice, scientific research...

journal.title: Daily Journal
journal.description: Reflect on your day. Your thoughts can reveal hidden career passions.
journal.feelingPlaceholder: e.g., Energized, curious, a bit tired...
journal.thoughtsPlaceholder: Describe your day, your tasks, what you enjoyed, and what you didn't.
journal.aiInsightsDescription: Based on your journal, here are some career paths you might find fulfilling.
journal.generatePrompt: Click the button to generate suggestions from your entries.

careers.title: Career Explorer
careers.description: Discover careers that align with your unique Ikigai profile.
careers.completeProfileDescription: Your Ikigai Canvas is empty. Please fill it out to enable AI career matching and sorting.
careers.dialogDescription: Here's how this career aligns with your profile.
careers.aiLoading: Our AI is analyzing your profile...
careers.notStrongMatch: This career might not be the strongest match right now. Check out other options!
careers.errorText: Something went wrong, or the AI is still thinking.
careers.plan_loading_text: AI is forging your epic journey into {careerTitle}!
careers.plan_error_text: Something went wrong. Click to try generating your plan again.
careers.plan_title: Your Gamified Action Plan for becoming a {careerTitle}

learnMore.title: How Kairos Compass Works
learnMore.description: Your automated guide to a fulfilling career path.
learnMore.flowDescription: We guide you from self-discovery to a concrete action plan in three simple steps.
learnMore.step1_text: Start with our interactive Ikigai Canvas. It's a space for you to articulate what you love, what you're good at, what the world needs, and what you can be paid for. This creates a unique profile that powers our AI.
learnMore.step2_text: Our AI analyzes your Ikigai profile and suggests careers that truly align with you. You'll see a personalized "fit score" and a detailed explanation for each match.
learnMore.step3_text: Once you pick a career, our AI generates a specific, step-by-step 3-year plan to help you achieve it. No more guesswork—just a clear path forward.
learnMore.featuresDescription: We use smart technology to make your career planning journey seamless.
learnMore.feature1_text: An interactive canvas to input your passions, skills, values, and interests.
learnMore.feature2_text: Use voice commands or text to interact with the app and fill out your journal entries.
learnMore.feature3_text: Our AI analyzes your profile to match you with careers from our curated database.
learnMore.feature4_text: Get a specific, actionable plan tailored to your chosen career goal.
learnMore.feature5_text: The app learns from your inputs, like journal entries, to refine suggestions over time and prefills information to save you time.

profile.title: Your Profile
profile.description: Manage your account information and Ikigai.
profile.cardDescription: Update your personal details and Ikigai below.

toasts.profileSavedDescription: Your Ikigai profile has been updated.
toasts.profileChangesSavedDescription: Your profile has been successfully updated.
toasts.voiceNotSupportedDescription: Your browser doesn't support voice recognition.
toasts.voiceErrorGeneral: An error occurred during voice recognition.
toasts.incompleteEntryDescription: Please fill out both your thoughts and feelings.
toasts.notEnoughDataDescription: Please write at least one journal entry first.
toasts.aiErrorJournal: Could not generate career suggestions at this time.
toasts.aiErrorCareerMatch: Could not generate a career match at this time.
toasts.aiErrorActionPlan: Could not generate an action plan at this time.
toasts.profileIncompleteDescription: Please complete your Ikigai Canvas before checking for a career match.
